alert.note: Alert for Toombs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 13 at 4:45PM EDT until April 13 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southern Toombs County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 444 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Grays Landing, or near Plant Hatch, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... English Eddy, Toombs Central, Johnson Corner, Ohoopee, New Branch and Grays Landing. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
